title: What the Dead Fear
description: Juniper Townsend died of carbon monoxide poisoning at the ripe, old age of 22.  However, death isn't the end. In Limbo, she finds a foggy wasteland and strange creatures. She also discovers that during night hours, she can walk among the living. But there are rules. Never influence destiny. Never interfere, because the consequences are dire.  Will she sacrifice eternal freedom to save the innocent?
author: Lea Ryan
